comments.author: joker_josue
comments.body: Why ETH? Sorry for the question, but it would be easier to find someone available to sell BTC.Either way, how were you planning on making the transaction? In cash? On a street date?You should give more details, so that we can understand the viability of the proposal.

comments.body: Stop creating posts with the same thing!
